data.name: 神话纪元 TitanSiege
data.detailed_description:
"Titan Siege" Taking the western myth as the historical background, this paper combines many ancient myths, such as Scandinavia and Greece, and tells the struggle between the ruling and destructive groups in the gods. The game overthrew the traditional thinking of the myth of the game, "human counter-attack on the gods" as the main idea. Arrive anywhere by swimming and flying; support for next-gen technology with massive delaying techniques to support dynamic lighting, volumetric lighting, ultra-far-reaching visual effects and subtle, vivid images. In addition to the traditional fixed copy of the game, pet fighting, siege war, but also provide a unique random copy, in the process of Daguai, will randomly start a copy of the region entrance, into a mysterious world. In the Boss battle, all occupations with the cooperation and assistance also require higher, requiring all professions work together to complete the challenge.

Warrior

has two skills systems: defense systems and weapons systems. Has a higher life and defense capabilities, most suitable for the melee in the battlefield charge of melee career.

Weapon warriors brutal, tyrannical, can quickly kill opponents. Defensive fighters excellent defensive ability, ideal for spending long opponents in the long battle to kill opponents.

Assassin

Melee career, with two skills: fighting system and assassination.

Good at assault and assassination. Kill enemies in a variety of complex environments, or swiftly attack enemies after sneaking.

Churchman

Long-distance career, with two skills: sacred and disciplinary system.

Has been given the power of divine, healing and Holy Light has the ability to discipline, can become a holy priest to assist his team-mate to fight or use holy light to attack the enemy's disciplinary pastor.

Sor

Long-distance occupation, has two skills: flame and frost department.

Enemies hit by long-range magic have the advantage of a high damage output and a large attack range. Fire Master good at long-range high damage monomer output, Frost Master is good at using a wide range of attack skills to kill or fight with multiple enemies.

Voodoo elements make

Summoning long-range occupation, with two skills: Department of dark and light department.

You can fight independently without the help of any teammates. Voodoo that can become summon monsters and specializes in Elemental Light Elemental elements, but also good at using Lightning to kill multiple or single enemies.


In Titan Siege, you will enter the game as a mercenary.

After being destroyed and used by the gods, they will then come to their senses and embark on a road of delusion that will prevent the gods from brutalizing against the earth.

You can also be a vaunted traveler, a wealthy businessman, a collector of mysterious props, a legendary savior, or even a leader of the people, or a vicious demon Choose your own.

data.short_description: "Titan Siege"is a 3D MMORPG game developed by 10 game enthusiasts. With XEngine's fully-developed 3D engine, the entire world is seamless with aesthetically pleasing images that create a true 3D world for you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows xp/7/8/8.1
  • Processor: AMD or Inter 2.0GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 2GB DDR3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 6250 or NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows xp/7/8/8.1
  • Processor: AMD or Inter 3.2GHz CPU or better
  • Memory: 4GB DDR3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 8370D or NVIDIA GeForce 8600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:
